tool_description: Build your NLP engine with the most complete set of multilingual NLP and text analytics tools available.
title: Bitext

api_list.name: Sentiment Analysis
api_list.description: Identify the topics of conversation and evaluate, extract and quantify the emotional state or attitude of your customers towards those topics with a polarity score value.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitext.p.rapidapi.comsignup"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitext.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Entity Extraction
api_list.description: Extract the relevant named entities (personal names, places, companies, addresses, dates, phone numbers, etc.).

api_list.name: Language identification
api_list.description: Identify what language a text is written in, including multilingual text. Available in over 50 languages.

api_list.name: Lemmatization
api_list.description: Identify all potential roots (lemmas) of each word, using morphological analysis and carefully-curated lexicons. Available in 15 languages.
